mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHARES (group_yn, owner_yn, reserved_number, share_id) VALUES (#{groupYn}, #{ownerYn}, #{reservedNumber}, #{shareId})
INSERT INTO TICKET (RESERVED_NUMBER, NAME, RESERVED_TIME, CANCEL, DEPARTURE, ARRIVAL) VALUES (#{reservedNumber}, #{name}, #{reservedTime}, #{cancel}, #{departureStation}, #{arrivalStation})
mapper.select: SELECT a.rn, a.reservedNumber, a.name, a.reservedTime, a.cancel, a.departureStation, a.arrivalStation FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.reservedNumber, a.name, a.reservedTime, a.cancel, a.departureStation, a.arrivalStation FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, RESERVED_NUMBER reservedNumber, NAME name, RESERVED_TIME reservedTime, CANCEL cancel, DEPARTURE departureStation, ARRIVAL arrivalStation FROM TICKET) a WHERE rn <= 1 * #{page}) a WHERE rn > 1 * (#{page} - 1) AND member_id = #{memberId} AND cancel = '0'
SELECT COUNT(RESERVED_NUMBER) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cancel = '0'

SELECT a.rn, a.reservedNumber, a.name, a.reservedTime, a.cancel, a.departureStation, a.arrivalStation FROM ( SELECT a.rn, a.reservedNumber, a.name, a.reservedTime, a.cancel, a.departureStation, a.arrivalStation FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, RESERVED_NUMBER reservedNumber, NAME name, RESERVED_TIME reservedTime, CANCEL cancel, DEPARTURE departureStation, ARRIVAL arrivalStation FROM TICKET) a WHERE rn <= 1 * #{page}) a WHERE rn > 1 * (#{page} - 1) AND member_id = #{memberId} AND cancel = '1'
SELECT COUNT(RESERVED_NUMBER) FROM MEMBER WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND cancel = '1'

SELECT t.train_id, t.seat_number, t.reserved_number, t.name, t.reserved_time, t.cancel FROM TICKET t, SHARES s WHERE t.reserved_number = #{reservedNumber} AND t.cancel = #{cancel} AND ((s.group_yn = 'N' AND s.share_id = {#memberId}) OR (s.group_yn = 'Y' AND s.share_id IN ( SELECT group_id FROM GROUP_MEMBER WHERE member_id = #{memberId})) )
